content.question: ​The function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 3 x"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is equivalent to the expression <math alttext="2 times h open parentheses w close parentheses plus h open parentheses p close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>·</mo><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>w</mi></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>p</mi></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="w"><semantics><mi>w</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="p"><semantics><mi>p</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are values in the domain of <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="log subscript 3 open parentheses open parentheses w p close parentheses squared close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><msup><mfenced><mrow><mi>w</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses log subscript 3 w close parentheses squared times open parentheses log subscript 3 p close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msup><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>w</mi></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>·</mo><mfenced><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="log subscript 3 open parentheses w squared p close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="log subscript 3 open parentheses 2 w p close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>w</mi><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="log subscript 3 open parentheses w squared p close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>w</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>p</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
